basic_creatures.name: Shambling Corpse
basic_creatures.flavor: It remembers nothing. It needs nothing. It stops for nothing.

basic_creatures.name: Rotting Ghoul
basic_creatures.flavor: The smell reaches you long before the claws do.

basic_creatures.name: Skeletal Knight
basic_creatures.flavor: Death did not release him from his oath.

basic_creatures.name: Grave Hulk
basic_creatures.flavor: Stitched from a dozen corpses. None of them are at rest.

basic_creatures.name: Pit Fiend
basic_creatures.flavor: It has many names. You will learn none of them.

basic_creatures.name: Bound Horror
basic_creatures.flavor: The chains are not for your protection.

basic_creatures.name: Thrall
basic_creatures.flavor: They gave everything for a taste of eternity.

basic_creatures.name: Nightstalker
basic_creatures.flavor: You won't see it. You'll only feel the cold.

basic_creatures.name: Blood Knight
basic_creatures.flavor: Chivalry died with him. The hunger did not.

basic_creatures.name: Vampire Lord
basic_creatures.flavor: He has ruled longer than your kingdom has existed.

basic_creatures.name: Dire Rat
basic_creatures.flavor: Where there is one, there are hundreds.

basic_creatures.name: Corrupted Wolf
basic_creatures.flavor: The forest twisted it. Now it returns the favor.

basic_creatures.name: Razorback
basic_creatures.flavor: Tusks like swords. Hide like armor. Temperament like hell.

basic_creatures.name: Hunting Horror
basic_creatures.flavor: It doesn't eat because it's hungry. It eats because you're there.
